text_chunk: Type 2 diabetes mellitus without complications. This code is used when a patient has diabetes mellitus that is not insulin dependent and there are no documented complications.
Essential (primary) hypertension. High blood pressure of unknown cause, also called primary or essential hypertension.
Encounter for antineoplastic chemotherapy. Used when a patient receives chemotherapy treatment for cancer.
Panniculitis, unspecified. Inflammation of the subcutaneous fat tissue.

description: Major depressive disorder, single episode, unspecified
text_chunk: Major depressive disorder, single episode, unspecified. A single episode of major depression without specific severity designation.

description: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute lower respiratory infection
text_chunk: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute lower respiratory infection. COPD complicated by an acute respiratory infection.
Chronic kidney disease, stage 3 (moderate). Moderate decrease in kidney function with GFR 30-59.
Gastro-esophageal reflux disease without esophagitis. GERD without inflammation of the esophagus.
Shortness of breath. Difficulty breathing or breathlessness, medically known as dyspnea.
Pain in right shoulder. Localized pain affecting the right shoulder joint and surrounding structures.
